comment: Professor Graham is an amazing professor and very good art professor, but is late to grade all the assignments assigned and lectures are really boring. Overall her class is pretty easy and if you do all her assignments you will pass with an A no problem.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: I took her Art in Society course to meet KSU requirements. The two most important factors of her class were her constant lectures and small, weekly art assignments. The directions of such were vague and the purpose was truly pointless. The worst part was the attendance policy. Missed 3 days due to illness and could not make an A. Do not take.

Was her 1st semester teaching so def some kinks to iron out. My biggest gripe is she puts u in groups and thn changes them every month. Assignmts are easy but doesn't give much time to complete. Mon assigmnts due b4 class on wed. Then discussion post & other assignment due sun. Pointless group presentation. Not hard. Just a lot for an art class.

I took her for a generic art class. She does not grade anything in a timely manner. In the last few weeks of the semester, I still didn't have any grades in the class. She is really strict about attendance when the class shouldn't even require attendance. Her assignments are vague and she does not always open a folder for you to submit it.
